text: I think right now in the climate that
we're seeing with so many campaigns I

no better time than to really continue
to shine a light on women feeling
empowered and people really helping to

delighted to be here this morning and
we're particularly happy it's been our
first War Foundation event with Meghan

as I said with we're pretty tied up with
planning a wedding in the moment I guess
we wait a couple months and then we can
hit the ground running but up until then
all these underlying causes across so
many different sectors Aaron I used to
go to a lot of engagements and see these

work but felt that we we could give more
what's interesting is I hear a lot of
people saying when speaking about girls
empowerment finding and knowing their
worth or women's empowerment as well
you'll often hear people say well you're
helping women find their voices and I
fundamentally disagree with that because
women don't need to find a voice they
have a voice they need to feel empowered
to use it and people need to be
encouraged to listen
